data/events_siren.xml$/FTL/event[@name=\: Before you even have time to react, a foreign vessel comes barreling towards you! You've never seen or heard of a ship like this, but you don't have time to question it, get ready to fight!
Whatever these aliens are - looks like they aren't above traditional cowardice. Scans show their FTL drive has been powered up and they're now trying to escape!
The mysterious alien vessel has escaped into the abyss. You can't linger around for long, but maybe some day you'll see these things again.
